AUTH_FAILED: Ошибка авторизации, проверьте своё имя пользователя и пароль.
NAME: Имя
ADD_DOCUMENT_TEXT: Добавить документ в выбранные коллекцииAdd document in the selected collection
COPY_DB_TEXT: Copy database within the selected server
ADD_TAB_TEXT: Open new tab with the selected collection
COPY_SAME: Копировать коллекцию в эту же БД
COPY_DIFFERENT_SERVER: Копировать коллекцию на другой сервер (другую БД)
COPY_DIFFERENT_SERVER_INFO: Note: The copy operation may take any longer
TITLE_GENERATE_SCHEMA:
Generate a new schema from all documents of the collection.
Attention, this operation may take a bit longer.
DROP_DB_WARNING: Вы действительно хотите удалить БД "{{ db }}" ?
DROP_COLLECTION_WARNING: Вы действительно хотите удалить коллекцию "{{ collection }}" ?
CONNECTION_EXAMPLE: Servername/IP + port   (e.g. 192.168.20.01:27017 or only 192.168.20.01 or localhost)
DB_NEW_SERVER_ERROR: Database could not create, please check your configurations or Input.
DB_ALREADY_EXISTS: База данных с именем "{{ db }}" уже сущесвует...
ERROR_EDIT_DATABASE: Could not edit chosen database, please check your input and configurations.
COLLECTION_ALREADY_EXISTS: Collection with chosen name "{{ collection }}" already exists...
ERROR_EDIT_COLLECTION: Could not edit chosen collection, please check your input and configurations.
ERROR_NEW_COLLECTION: Could not add new collection, please check your input and configurations.
ERROR_DOCUMENT_SYNTAX: Document or schema has an incorrect syntax, please check your input.
ERROR_SAVING_DOCUMENT: Document could not be saved, please check your input and server-connection.
ERROR_SAVING_SCHEMA: JSON-schema could not save, please check your input.
ERROR_UPDATING_COLLECTIONS: Невозможно обновить коллекцию в БД "{{ db }}" .
ERROR_SERVER_CONNECTION: неовзможно подключиться к выбранному серверу. Ошибка: {{ errormessage }}
ERROR_PARSE_QUERY_OPTIONS: Couldn't execute your query, please check your input of the query options.
ERROR_PARSE: Parse-Error: Input must be of object-type
ERROR_PARSE_IMPORT_TEXT_FIELD: Parse error: Please check your input
ERROR_GET_INDEXES_OF_COLLECTION: Mongo-error: The indexes of collection could´nt be loaded.
WARNING_LIMIT_QUERY: The result was limited to 100 hits, for a more precise query use limit() and/or skip().
INDEX_ALREADY_EXISTS: Индекс с именем "{{ indexName }}" уже существует...
DROP_INDEX_WARNING: Вы действительно хотите удалить выбранный индекс коллекции "{{ collection }}"?
DROP_ALL_INDEXES_WARNING: Вы дейтсвительно хотите удалить все индексы выбранной коллекции "{{ collection }}"?
INFO_UNIQUE: Creates a unique index so that the collection will not accept insertion of documents where the index key or keys match an existing value in the index. Specify "true" to create a unique index.
INFO_DROP_DUPLICATES: Creates a unique index on a field that may have duplicates. MongoDB indexes only the first occurrence of a key and removes all documents from the collection that contain subsequent occurrences of that key.
INFO_SPARSE: If true, the index only references documents with the specified field. These indexes use less space but behave differently in some situations (particularly sorts). The default value is false. This applies only to ascending/descending indexes.
INFO_TTL_INDEX: Specifies a value, in seconds, as a TTL (time to life) to control how long MongoDB retains documents in this collection.
INFO_BACKGROUND_INDEXING: By default, MongoDB builds indexes in the foreground and prevent all read and write operations to the database while the index builds. Also, no operation that requires a read or write lock on all databases (e.g. listDatabases) can occur during a foreground index build. Background index construction allows read and write operations to continue while building the index.
INFO_DEFAULT_LANGUAGE: The default language associated with the indexed data determines the list of stop words and the rules for the stemmer and tokenizer. The default language for the indexed data is english.
INFO_LANGUAGE_OVERRIDE: Specify the name of the field in the document, that contains the language to override the default language.
INFO_WEIGTH: By default, the text command returns matching documents based on scores, from highest to lowest. For a text index, the weight of an indexed field denotes the significance of the field relative to the other indexed fields in terms of the score. The score for a given word in a document is derived from the weighted sum of the frequency for each of the indexed fields in that document.
ERROR_UPLOADING_FILES: Во время сохранения файлов произошла ошибка.
DROP_FILES_SPOT: еретащите сюда файл или нажмите кнопку 'Выбрать файл'
REPLACE_FILE_SPOT: Перетащите сюда файл или нажмите кнопку 'Выбрать файл'
EXPORT_INFO_QUERY_SELECTION: This option is only available in Find-mode (F)
IMPORT_REPLACE: Replace documents in collection by import (disabled when unknown collection)
IMPORT_MERGE: Append documents in collection with import
IMPORT_SUCCESS: {{ result }} of {{ origin }} documents successfully imported.
LOGIN_DATABASE_TEXT: Name of the database against the user is authenticated to
REMOVE_USER_WARNING: Вы действительно хотите удалить пользователя "{{ user }}" из БД "{{ database }}"?
OVERWRITE_USER: Пользователь уже существует. В случае сохранения существующий пользователь будет изменён.
DESTINATION_DATABASE_TEXT: Name of the database to connect
INFO_IMPORT: The import process may take some time to complete, with a larger number of records or a memory size greater than 100 MB of the collection we recommend mongoexport and mongoimport through the console.
DELETE_DOCUMENT_NOID_ERROR: Невозможно удалить документ, поскольку у него нет _id.
EDIT_DOCUMENT_NOID_ERROR: Невозможно отредактировать документ, поскольку у него нет _id.
SCRIPT_SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Script executed successfully, but result can't be shown because it is empty.
USERSOURCE_OR_PWD_REQUIRED: User source or password are required!
EITHER_USERSOURCE_OR_PWD_REQUIRED: User source or password are required, but not both.
DELETE_SUCCESS: {{ result }} of {{ origin }} documents successfully deleted.
DELETE_DOCUMENT_ERROR: Операция удаления не может быть завершена ("_id-Error")!
SSH_HOST_TEXT: Address of the destination SSH server
SSH_LOCAL_PORT_TEXT: Local port which is used for the ssh tunnel (optional), default is set by the system
EMPTY_QUERY_LIST: There are no saved queries for this collection.
ERROR_FORMAT_CONNECTION: Couldn't create connection. Please check the correct spelling of the connection.
INFO_SLAVE_OK: Allows read operations on slaves of a replica set, the default setting is "false".
READ_OPERATIONS_ONLY: You are connected to a replica-set through a slave server. Therefore only read operations are possible!
SSH_PRIVATE_KEY_TEXT: Absolute path to the file with the private key
SSH_PASSPHRASE_TEXT: Password of the private ssh key file
SSH_HOST_REQUIRED: The SSH server is required when SSH is enabled
SSH_USER_REQUIRED: The SSH user is required when SSH is enabled
ERROR_UPDATE_EMPTY_RESULT: Record was not updated. Maybe you are using a data type for the field '_id' which is currently not supported by the app
